a1: You can convert between MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, and AAC. The tool accepts any audio format your browser can read and outputs in your chosen format.
a2: Converting to lossless formats (WAV, FLAC) preserves full quality. Converting to lossy formats (MP3, OGG, AAC) uses high-quality settings to minimize any loss.
q3: Is there a file size limit?
a3: The tool supports audio files up to 100 MB. All processing happens in your browser using FFmpeg WebAssembly â€” your files are never uploaded.
